result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lorenzo Smart Shuman

records.addlTxt:
9:48 AM Judge Annette Barna appears by video from Rusk County Courthouse. Defendant Lorenzo Smart Shuman in court.  Attorney Russ S. Kort appeared by video for Lorenzo Smart Shuman.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. Court reviews court record. State makes comment on proceedings for the hearing today and a PSI request, Atty Kort agrees. Court addresses the DEF on zoom appearances by attorney and Judge. DEF agrees for the zoom appearance. Court finds the DEF freely, voluntarily, and knowingly agrees to proceed with zoom appearances of judge and DEF Atty. Plea Questionnaire submitted to Court by Atty Kort. Court reviews Plea Questionnaire with DEF. DEF enters NC plea. Court acknowledges that the DEF knowingly, willingly, and intellectually has given his guilty plea. DEF advised of rights and penalties; DEF waives rights; parties stipulate to facts. Court accepts plea and finds DEF guilty. Court orders a Presentence Investigation to be completed and filed by December 22, 2022. State will cap at PSI recommendation, all parties agree. Court schedules a sentencing date.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 03:00 pm.
Sentencing hearing on January 4, 2023 at 03:00 pm.
Supervision Report - Justice Point

11:03 AM Defendant Lorenzo Smart Shuman appeared by video with audio connection only.  Attorney Russ S. Kort appeared by video for Lorenzo Smart Shuman.  Attorney Bruce Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. Court reviews court record. Atty Kort makes comment that the parties have come to an agreement, 21CF216 and 21CM139, requests that this case be consolidated with Judge Annette Barna.  Atty Kort comments on waiver of the preliminary hearing. State agrees with the consolidation, Court discussion follows. State comments that the case will be amended to a misdemeanor and will not need a preliminary or an arraignment, all parties agree. 11:05 am: DEF video turns on. Court will schedule a status conference in November to make sure the case resolves with Judge Winton with a General Assignment/ Global Resolution on October 31st, 2022.
Plea/Schedule scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on November 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Plea/Schedule on October 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Supervision Report from Justice Point
Status conference on October 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
9:38 AM Defendant Lorenzo Smart Shuman in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attny Russ Kort appears by video (special appearance) for Lorenzo Shuman. Court calls case and recites appearances. Court reviews court record and cash bond conflict. Court addresses the DEF on the bond money. State request money to be posted within 10 days on 9/25/22 or report back to the Sawyer County Jail. Atty Russ Kort has no comment. DEF has not received the copy of criminal complaint prior to the court date. Atty Kort requests a breakout session to discuss with the DEF on the charges. 9:50 am OFF RECORD - Atty Kort, DEF, and DEF parents have breakout session for criminal complaint discussion. 10:04 AM On Record - Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives formal reading. DEF waives time limits of preliminary hearing. State and Def Atty to have pre-trial discussion away from court on 9/28/22. Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Initial appearance on September 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Application and Order for Specific Judicial Assignment

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.
